nodes.documentation: @dev Returns number of my allowances (that i set before for SideB)
nodes.name: getMyAllowancesCount

nodes.documentation:
@dev Return allowance data (enumerator)

nodes.documentation:
@dev If SideB has overdrafted -> it can no longer withdraw without SideA calling 'clearOverdraftedFlag'.
Should be called by the SideA for the SideB
nodes.name: clearOverdraftedFlag

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the number of allowances that were set by other people for me
nodes.name: getAllowancesCount

nodes.documentation:
